info: The Project will rehabilitate about 37.5 kilometers (km) of the two-lane paved road bypassing Ganja, Azerbaijan's second largest city. The project road is part of the country's primary east-west highway linking the capital, Baku, to the Georgian border. It will conform to Azerbaijan's standards for a category II road, with a 7.5-meter (m)-wide pavement and 3.75 m shoulders. The Project will contribute to socioeconomic development in Azerbaijan and its cooperation with Georgia through improved road network, increased traffic, and expanded trade through building an efficient, safe, and sustainable road network, linking Azerbaijan domestically and internationally.
name: MFF-ROAD NETWORK DEVT PROGRAM - PROJECT 2
